keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: The figures suggest that a deal brokered by the European Union with Turkey has worked, although human rights groups have raised concerns.

headline.print_headline: Migration to Greece From Turkey by Sea Has Plummeted, U.N. Says
headline.main: Migration to Greece by the Aegean Sea Has Plummeted, U.N. Says

snippet: The figures suggest that a deal brokered by the European Union with Turkey has worked, although human rights groups have raised concerns....
abstract: United Nations releases figures showing number of migrants undergoing dangerous journey from Turkey to Greece has plummeted, in sign that deal brokered with Turkey to slow flow of asylum seekers is having some success.
